[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/terminal](./terminal.md) &gt; [ITerminalProvider](./terminal.iterminalprovider.md)

## ITerminalProvider interface

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Implement the interface to create a terminal provider. Terminal providers can be registered to a [Terminal](./terminal.terminal.md) instance to receive messages.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ITerminalProvider 
```

</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** This property should return true only if the terminal provider supports rendering console colors.
